text: to jab zulekha ne unake taane sune to us ne un auraton ko bula bheja aur unake lie ek majalis aaraasta kee aur usamen se har ek ke haath mein ek chhuree aur ek (naarangee) dee (aur kah diya ki jab tumhaare saamane aae to kaat ke ek faak usako de dena) aur yoosuf se kaha ki ab inake saamane se nikal to jao to jab un auraton ne use dekha to usake bada haseen paaya to sab ke sab ne (be khudee mein) apane apane haath kaat daale aur kahane lagee haay allaah ye aadamee nahin hai ye to ho na ho bas ek muaziz (ijzat vaala) farishta hai
